thread.title: Schumer wants to keep drones way from airports, major events
thread.title_full: Schumer wants to keep drones way from airports, major events

author: MICHAEL BALSAMO
title: Schumer wants to keep drones way from airports, major events
text:
Schumer wants to keep drones way from airports, major events   
NEW YORK (AP) â€” Drone manufacturers would be forced to implement technology to keep the unmanned crafts away from airports and possibly events like parades and major sporting contests under a proposal Sen. Charles Schumer plans to introduce this week. 
Schumer said he would introduce an amendment to a bill that funds the Federal Aviation Administration requiring drones sold or operated in the U.S. to have geo-fencing technology that would prevent them from operating within two miles of an airport or above 500 feet. kAm%96 2>6?5>6?E H@F=5 2=D@ 6?4@FC286 E96 upp E@ 6?24E A@=:4:6D 7@C3:55:?8 5C@?6D :? @E96C QD6?D:E:G6 =@42E:@?D[Q =:<6 DA@CE:?8 6G6?ED[ A2C256D @C ?62C E96 !6?E28@?[ $49F>6C E@=5 %96 pDD@4:2E65 !C6DD @? $2EFC52J]k^Am kAmQv@5 7@C3:5 2 5C@?6 H2D DF4<65 :?E@ E96 6?8:?6 @7 2 A2DD6?86C 2:C=:?6 E92E H2D 7=J:?8[ :EV5 36 2 9F86 EC2865J[Q 96 D2:5] Qp?5 :EVD 2 >2EE6C @7 E:>6 367@C6 E92E 92AA6?D]Qk^Am kAm&?56C 4FCC6?E C68F=2E:@?D[ 5C@?6 A:=@ED >FDE 86E 4=62C2?46 E@ 7=J H:E9:? d >:=6D @7 2 D:K623=6 2:CA@CE :? >@DE 42D6D] %96 upp 2=D@ ?@E:7:65 5C@?6 6?E9FD:2DED :? ~4E@36C E92E E96 =2H 5@6D ?@E 2==@H E96> E@ 7=J E96 2:C4C27E ?62C |2;@C {628F6 q2D632==[ }u{ 2?5 }rpp s:G:D:@? x 4@==686 7@@E32== 82>6D 2?5 >2;@C 2FE@ C246D]k^Am kAmupp @77:4:2=D 5:5 ?@E :>>65:2E6=J C6EFC? 2 >6DD286 D66<:?8 4@>>6?E @? $F?52J]k^Am kAm$49F>6C D2:5 9:D 2>6?5>6?E H2D 2?
